asset_name_translations.en: Guidelines on the acquisition and reuse of software for public administrations

description_translations.en: This resource aims at explaining how to acquire and reuse software in PA context.
description_translations.es: Este recurso pretende explicar cómo adquirir y reutilizar software en el contexto de la AP.
description_translations.it: Questa risorsa mira a spiegare come acquisire e riutilizzare software nel contesto della PA.
description_translations.lv: Šī resursa mērķis ir skaidrot, kā iegūt un atkārtoti izmantot programmatūru valsts pārvaldē.

name_translations.en: Guidelines on the acquisition and reuse of software for public administrations
name_translations.es: Directrices sobre la adquisición y reutilización de programas informáticos para las administraciones públicas
name_translations.it: Linee guida per l'acquisizione e il riutilizzo di software per le pubbliche amministrazioni
name_translations.lv: Programmatūras iegūšanas un atkārtotas izmantošanas vadlīnijas valsts pārvaldē
